duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage complex enterprise projects from initiation to closeout, ensuring successful implementation of hardware, software, and civil requirements.
Collaborate closely with customers and support teams to coordinate the installation of products, using analytical skills and a keen eye for detail to ensure systems work as designed.
Manage the overall financial budget of the project to maintain and improve the originating budget and gross margin.
Communicate effectively with clients, subcontractors, branch personnel, and support, creating all required customer submittals.
Obtain price quotes from subcontractors, ensure contract agreements are in place, and meet insurance requirements for all subcontractors prior to beginning work.
Produce a positive work environment, create strong relationships, and enhance the product experience.
Attend weekly customer project meetings (virtual and on-site) and monthly customer meetings at customer corporate office.
Work with Microsoft Suite and customer administrative tools, and engage in local travel during the design phase and implementation.
Embrace obstacles, seek out alternative solutions, and provide ideas and recommendations to better serve customers, internally and externally.
Complete other tasks as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent (Technology, Business Administration, or Construction related majors preferred)
